vsParam:
Brilliant, the "Descent Battle" is finally about to start!
Thank god this "Descent Battle - Light" won't rank our scores.

Captain Tandrion lost his monster for the "Descent Battle"...
Uh-huh! Anyway, we're occupied with trifles, excuse us!

OK, our enemy is... a "Trick Caster"!
He's capable of various wizardry, pretty tough!

Plus, he's followed by familiars! We do outnumber them,
but a many-to-many fight is still tough!

The number of people counts in a fight! First, use a target-all attack to
reduce our enemies... to a great extent within one blow!

By the way, "Trick Casters"are overpowered by the Water Element!
If we got a Water Element comrade, it'll make our fight much easier!

If the enemy is too powerful to be defeated, we can challenge it
after enhancement! Sub gears ready? Taken your cuisines!?

As an alchemist, it comes really... really critical to get
fully prepared! It may be useful to take enough items with you!

Anyway... Let's fight with might and main!
I have faith in you!!
